General Personality Tips

Karlach is both Violent and Compassionate. Though she is against evil acts, she is more than happy to choose violent actions that isn't evil. Being both Violent and Compassionate makes her the most liked person by all the origin companions. Karlach, Astarion and Lae'zel gains approval from acts of violence like starting fights.
